text: Y all s understand of tic tok is toxic This is going to be long So  I see a lot of people around here hating on tic tok  Which is fair but I would say they are most definitely hating it for the wrong reasons   The biggest thing if seen is that girls are posting soft core porn on it because they twerk a little to a song  Idk when the word changed meaning but considering the fact that they re   Still dressed and   It s a simple dance  Twerking is not soft core porn   And why hate on the female aspect of the app  They re just having fun  They shake their butt a little  who cares  Why is them exuding confidence in their body and self an issue for you  And all the weird people who contact them are weird to them too  And even if they re not that s ok because they should have the ability to explore life themselves and as long as they re doing it confidently and safely  I don t think it s an issue   The biggest problem with tic tok I would say is the lack of creativity and the obsession the algorithm has with people of privilege upper class  generally white  I can t tell you how many guys I have seen on tic tok putting a stupid chain in their mouth without a shirt on trying to look  hot  on camera or something  The girls who do the same dumb dance to the same song but in a different area  Or the people who try to do bits but don t know what timing is or what a punch line is  Or the people who literally just show off their parents  amazing house and still get thousands of likes and stuff   Tic tok is dumb  It s community is full of repetition and privilege  But it s stupid to dog on women just because they like to shake their ass   Thank you ted you can fill in missing words on this sentence
